These are data from https://www.modernstatisticswithr.com/ about daily weather and revenues of
a business.

```{r}
# read data

rev_data <- read.csv("~/R/Statistics_JWL/data/weather_and_sales/sales-rev.csv", sep = ";")
weather_data <- read.csv("~/R/Statistics_JWL/data/weather_and_sales/sales-weather.csv", sep = ";")
```

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)

rev_data <- as.data.table(rev_data)
weather_data <- as.data.table(weather_data)
```

```{r}
rev_weather_data <- merge(rev_data, weather_data,
      by = "DATE")
```
